About Mehdi

Mehdi is an entrepreneur, author and investor in the API space, known as a strong API evangelist and advocate.

He founded APIdays conferences, the main serie of conference on APIs, built OAuth.io a devtools to integrate API Identity (acquired) and now building API to make GDPR programmable on alias.dev. He co-authored Continuous API Management (O'Reilly 2018, 2021). He founded lesmainteneurs.org, a non-profit looking for giving back merit to maintainers over innovators.

Hail the Maintainers!
pageContext.name: Mehdi Medjaoui
